import React from "react"; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Us: Empowering Children Through Playful Learning

At Sashakt , We believe every child deserves to know and claim their fundamental rights. We're passionate about making this journey not only informative, but also engaging and fun. Our platform caters specifically to children between 8 and 16 years old, ensuring inclusivity and accessibility regardless of background or circumstance. We understand the power of play, and that's why we've built an interactive experience that seamlessly blends learning with entertainment.

Tailored experiences for every age:

Younger Explorers (8-11 years): Choose your adventure! Dive into captivating games or educational videos, each designed to spark curiosity and understanding about child rights. Conquer a level, answer a question, and unlock the next exciting step in your journey. Empowered Champions (12-16 years): Take charge of your learning with interactive modules that offer two engaging routes: learn through a vibrant world of games or explore informative videos. Each path equips you with the knowledge and confidence to stand up for yourself and others.

Beyond games and videos:

Our platform offers an extra layer of support with a friendly chatbots one built on React Chatbot Kit and other on DialogFlow. This helpful companion is always ready to answer your questions and guide you along your learning path.

More than just knowledge:

At Sashakt, we want to empower children to be active participants in protecting their rights and the rights of others. We believe that informed confidence is the key to positive change, and we're committed to providing the tools and resources to make that happen.

Join us on this journey!

Explore our platform, play the games, watch the videos, and discover the power of your own voice. Together, we can create a world where every child knows their rights and has the courage to stand up for them.

Let's play, learn, and grow together!

Meet our Team

); } export default AboutUs;
